item.content:encoded:
Bunny Friend Kids Easter Classroom Cards

Best Deals! Bunny Friend Kids Easter Classroom Cards – Easter Cards Popular Bunny Friend Kids Easter Classroom Cards help you save during this period Bunny Friend Kids Easter Classroom Cards See more about itDon’t forget to shop for classroom Easter cards like this adorable design for kids to hand out at school. Personalized school Easter cards for kids with cute bunny rabbits and watercolor spring florals. The message reads "Some bunny thinks you’re a great friend!" or customize it with your own text. Add your child’s name for easy labeling for school Easter cards or party favors.

Add your custom wording to this design by using the "Edit this design template" boxes on the right hand side of the item, or click the blue "Customize it" button to arrange the text, change the fonts and colors and to also add additional information or images to this design. Click "Customize Further" to open full editing options. If you need any coordinating items, (thank you cards, etc.) please contact me for a custom order.
****For custom requests you need my help with, do not place this merchandise in your cart. Instead, email me your request at [email protected] A link to your merchandise will be emailed to you once the item is available. You can use that link to place your order. Please allow up to 48 hours. Price:$2.06
